mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_id = #{deptId} AND is_stop = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_dept WHERE dept_code = #{deptCode} AND is_stop = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_dept WHERE is_stop = 0 ORDER BY dept_code ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_dept WHERE super_dept_code = #{superDeptCode} AND is_stop = 0 ORDER BY dept_code ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dept (dept_code, dept_name, super_dept_code, dept_level, dept_phone, dept_manager_id, is_stop, create_user) VALUES (#{deptCode}, #{deptName}, #{superDeptCode}, #{deptLevel}, #{deptPhone}, #{deptManagerId}, #{isStop}, #{createUser})
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_dept SET is_stop = 1 WHERE dept_id = #{deptId}
